front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Precision Coaxial Connectors at RF, Microwave and Millimeter-wave Frequencies

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This IEEE P287 series of documents presents the combined efforts of IEEE P287 Working Group that reflect the knowledge and experience of leading specialists in the development and measurement of precision coaxial connectors for RF, microwave and millimeter-wave frequencies. It presents minimum performance requirements to standardize both hermaphroditic and pin- and socket-type connectors (IEEE Std. P287.1-D11/10/2021, this document). It provides recommended electrical and mechanical test procedures for Instrument Grade and Metrology Grade precision connectors (IEEE Std. P287.2-D10/09/2021). Recommended reference procedures including connector effects, connector care and cleaning, connector repeatability and reproducibility test procedures, and a color code for connectors are detailed in the third part of the standard (IEEE Std. P287.3-D10/08/2021).. A bibliography provides a list of pertinent references for measurement techniques used in determining electrical, mechanical, and dimensional parameters for coaxial connectors.
